wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Charles Patrick Ralph Palmer,  (29 April 1933 – 23 November 1999) was a senior British Army officer. He served as Constable and Governor of Windsor Castle 1992 to 1999. He had been Commander-in-Chief, Allied Forces Northern Europe.

link_mentions.page: Constables and Governors of Windsor Castle
